flex.summary: Create consistently spaced custom layouts that are responsive to other layouts and PatternFly components.

gallery.summary: Arrange content in a responsive grid of uniform rows and columns.

grid.summary: Arrange content on a fixed-size 12 column grid.

split.summary: Distribute multiple items horizontally, which adapt to viewport resizing.

stack.summary: Distribute multiple items vertically, which adapt to the available space of a container.
